item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hour series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: The Red Fez (on Peck St. near 10 and McFaddens) in downtown Providence

The Red Fez has been around forever and is so ultra arty-hip that the RISD students hang out there (as do some designers I know - lol!). Its so cool the sign is just a red fez (look for the hat on the sign - its a cone-shaped hat with a gold tassel). Incidently the grilled cheese is amazing. We'll be upstairs at the bar and there are tables to sit at too. So let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: Anne Marie is hosting this one!!! Please look at her picture!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - The Red Fez!
